title: Might.and.Magic.Heroes.VII-CODEX
description:
ABOUT THE GAME

Our story takes place during a war of succession. The Empressâ€™ murder has left a realm in flames with many hungry rivals ready to seize the throne by force. The Duke Ivan then calls together a prestigious council of six trusted advisors to restore order and end the conflict that set ablaze Ashanâ€™s lands.

Might & MagicÂ® HeroesÂ® VII makes a triumphant return bringing you the essence of turn based strategy gaming. Set in a fantasy universe with RPG progression with a strong story narrative, you will embark on a journey that you will never forget!

FEATURES

Explore and conquer the enchanted world of Ashan
Develop and manage your economy
Lead armies of legendary creatures to battle
Build up Heroes of Might & Magic with hundreds of abilities and powerful artifacts

Title: Might & MagicÂ® HeroesÂ® VII
Genre: RPG, Strategy
Developer: Limbic Entertainment
Publisher: Ubisoft
Release Date: 29 Sep, 2015




Minimum:
OS: Windows 7 SP1 or Windows 8/8.1 (64bit only)
Processor: Intel Core i5 660 3.3 GHz or AMD Phenom II X4 955 @ 3.2 GHz
Memory: 4 GB RAM
Graphics: nVidia GeForce GTX460 or AMD Radeon HD5850 (1024 MB VRAM)

Recommended:
OS: Windows 7 SP1 or Windows 8/8.1 (64bit only)
Processor: Intel Core i5 2400 @ 3.1 GHz or AMD FX-6100 @ 3.3 GHz
Memory: 6 GB RAM
Graphics: nVidia GeForce GTX670 or AMD Radeon HD7870 (2048 MB VRAM)




      
      - Extract 
      - Burn or mount the .iso
      - Run setup.exe and install
      - Copy crack from CODEX dir to installdir
      - Play
      
      
      NOTE: 
	  
      While testing, we noticed that the x86 version of this game
      is broken at several places. E.g. the game crashes if you play
      the campaign with Jorgen (black guy to the left) or if you load
      certain maps in skirmish mode. We confirmed this happens on
      the original game on uplay too, so this is not crack related.
      The x64 version has been much more stable - so we recommend you
      play that if you can until Ubisoft fixes their bugs.
	  
	  
      General Notes:

      - Block the game's exe in your firewall to prevent the game from 
        trying to go online ..
      - If you install games to your systemdrive, it may be necessary
        to run this game with admin privileges instead
